description: This file defines a React component named CustomersList that displays a list of customers, allows creating new customers, editing, and deleting existing ones. It manages state for customer data, loading status, and errors; interacts with an API for fetching and deleting customers; and renders a table with customer details and action buttons.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the list of customers from the API and updates the component state.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Handles deletion of a customer by ID, with user confirmation and page reload.
